pageProduct.name: A'kin Age Defy Line Smoothing Day Cream 50ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

This day cream will brighten,protect and revitalise skin tonaturally fight the signs of ageing.Combining the powers of EchiumOil, Camu Camu and Vitamin C tobrighten and even your skin tone,intensively hydrate and combatlines, wrinkles and age spots fornaturally radiant youthful looking skin.

Ingredients

Water(aqua), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter+, Glycerin, Isostearyl Isostearate, Cetearyl Olivate, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Cetearyl Nonanoate, Sorbitan Olivate, Niacinamide, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Sorbitol, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Lactate, Phenoxyethanol, Arginine, Hydrogenated Olive Oil, Cetyl Palmitate, Allantoin, Sorbitan Palmitate, Titanium Dioxide, Olea europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Echium Plantagineum Seed Oil, Fragrance, Sodium Citrate, Xanthan Gum, Mica, Ethylhexylglycerin, Myrciaria Dubia Fruit Juice, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Piroctone Olamine, Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil Unsaponifiables, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Tocopherol, Potassium Sorbate,  Citronellol, Geraniol, Linalool, Citral, Limonene

Directions

Morning & evening, massage into facial skin after cleansing.

USAGE ADVICE

Use products with Vitamin C to assist with skin brightness, stimulation of collagen and even skin tone.
